sentences.sContent: The formal living room has a fireplace and vaulted ceilings.
sentences.sContent_eng: The formal living room has a fireplace and vaulted ceilings.
sentences.sCn: 正式的客厅有一个壁炉和拱形天花板。

sentences.sContent: For that reason, many new homes now have big, open kitchens and vaulted ceilings.
sentences.sContent_eng: For that reason, many new homes now have big, open kitchens and vaulted ceilings.
sentences.sCn: 因为这个原因，现在许多新房子都有大而开放的厨房以及拱形的屋顶。

words.tran: 给…盖以拱顶；作成穹形；跳跃（vault的ing形式）

trans.tranOther: in the shape of or consisting of several arches joined together
